html:
Prepare slaughter for his children for the iniquities of their fathers. The children of evildoers will perish because they heeded their wicked fathers' sayings.

that they do not rise, nor possess the land, nor fill the face of the world with cities. The righteous will possess the lands of promise (14:1-2) and build cities of Zion for the pure in heart. The wicked, however, will not be blessed to inherit such cities of Zion.
